title: Musa
description: Stress and hormones? The most toxic relationship. That's why 80% of people with cycles deal with cramps and PMS (mood swings and anxiety before period) once a month. Musa turns self-care habits into a game you’ll want to play, helping you reduce stress to balance hormones, boost mood, and ditch the monthly struggle. Join now to get your daily Hormonscope, and hatch the egg with your first baby dragon.
